entry.title: Monday night: Rain mixed with snow. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain mixed with snow this evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High 7 with temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating in the afternoon. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High 7 with temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 23 January 2023
